name: AcID MoRNING AfFTER An AcID DaTE & AMAAAD REWORKMOSH
description:
* Since the update of Glitché came out i have been exploring it and have always felt the desire to come back to my pieces/work whenever i feel i have a new way to approach it. i try to never truly see it as "finished". 

+ For what has been and for more to come: i present AcID MoRNING AfFTER An AcID DaTE & AMAAAD, reworked. moshed.

* Glitché provides a feeling of randomness while creating that i enjoy a lot. i never truly know the outcome -what a piece will be- until it is.  for example, here -like in a lot of my pieces- the switches between colors and movement flows are made "manually", each time there is a change of aspect or flow there is a movement of my fingers on the touch-screen. pressig lightly, pressing heavy and steady or letting go...  sometimes to the rhythm of a song, others just by "instinct".
